comments.author: Marcel Reutegger
comments.body:
Committed patch in revision: 631539

Thank you for the patch.

description:
code repetitively converts OffsetCharSequence to strings, and then repetitively converts to lower/upper case, when generating search terms.

Patch fixes this.
summary: [PATCH] reduce duplicate conversions from OffsetCharSequence to (lower/upper) strings
